body: i'm thankful that today d and i have been married for three years. i'm thankful to get to spend my days and nights with the person i love most in the world. i'm thankful to be lucky that there are lots of things to be grateful for in my life, but i'm also thankful to know that she is what i'm most grateful for, by miles and miles and miles.
